General.Name: Ningbo Ronbay New Energy Tech Ltd
General.Description: Ningbo Ronbay New Energy Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of lithium battery ternary cathode materials in China and internationally. Its products are used in new energy vehicle power batteries, energy storage equipment, and electronic products. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Yuyao, China.
General.Address: No.39, East Road of Tanjialing, Yuyao, China, 315400
